content.query:
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM 
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://ecommstores.blob.core.windows.net/olistdata/silver/',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    )AS result1


CREATE SCHEMA gold
    CREATE VIEW gold.final
    AS
    SELECT
     *
FROM 
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://ecommstores.blob.core.windows.net/olistdata/silver/',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    )AS result1


    SELECT * 
    FROM gold.final
